Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only stands out in its field but also offers unparalleled value and benefits to those who use it. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering its immense potential to add significant value to your endeavors, I am extending this opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $15000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while acknowledging the product's true worth. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
